snippet.title: Princess Maker 2 Regeneration Original Animation Trailer
snippet.description:
This is the original animation trailer created for “Princess Maker 2: Regeneration.”
The original opening animation was produced by Yonago Gainax. The animation, led by Mr. Takami Akai, aims to evoke the future relationship between the player (who becomes the “father”) and the “daughter” bestowed upon them by the star god.
Feel free to immerse yourself in this heartwarming journey where you’ll raise your daughter and shape her dreams in the world of “Princess Maker 2: Regeneration”!

https://blissbrain.co.jp/pm2rg-e/
